issue.message: Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.compose.runtime.lint.RuntimeIssueRegistry`) which requires a newer API level. That means that the custom lint checks are intended for a newer lint version; please upgrade.

Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.compose.ui.lint.UiIssueRegistry`) which requires a newer API level. That means that the custom lint checks are intended for a newer lint version; please upgrade.

Requires newer lint; these checks **will be skipped**!
Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.lifecycle.lint.LiveDataCoreIssueRegistry`) which was compiled against a newer version of lint than this one. This is usually fine, but not in this case; some basic verification shows that the lint check jar references (for example) the following API which is not valid in the version of lint which is running: org.jetbrains.kotlin.analysis.api.lifetime.impl.NoWriteActionInAnalyseCallChecker: void afterLeavingAnalysisContext() (Referenced from androidx/lifecycle/lint/NonNullableMutableLiveDataDetector$createUastHandler$1.class)
Therefore, this lint check library is **not** included in analysis. This affects the following lint checks: `NullSafeMutableLiveData`
To use this lint check, upgrade to a more recent version of lint.
Version of Lint API this lint check is using is 14. The Lint API version currently running is 13 (7.3+).
Call requires API level 26 (current min is 24): `java.time.LocalDateTime#now`
`?android:attr/colorError` requires API level 26 (current min is 24)
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.google.firebase.messaging.DisplayNotification)
Attribute `dataExtractionRules` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 24)
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
Format string '`InvoiceLine1WithoutSeller`' is not a valid format string so it should not be passed to `String.format`
